documents.accomplishment: In 2024, https://abruno.net was featured on DarkModeDesign and DeadSimpleSites website showcase
In 2023 Copy Email Extension https://github.com/anthonybruno/copy-mail-extension was featured on the Chrome Web Store
In 2015 I was nominated for a Webby Award for client work showcasing creative frontend development and UX
In 2016 I contributed to the Nelson Cash growth during its recognition on the Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Companies list
In 2018 Mark Zuckerberg reviewed my work and said it 'looked good'
